categories: Category:Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters

nodes.text: Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters

Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters is an ongoing canon comic book crossover event and miniseries from Marvel Comics. The comics were announced on February 16, 2021 and began publication with the release of War of the Bounty Hunters Alpha 1 on May 5, 2021. Issues of the ongoing series Star Wars: Bounty Hunters, Star Wars: Darth Vader, Star Wars: Doctor Aphra, and Star Wars are included in the crossover event that also began in the month of May. A 5-issue miniseries by Charles Soule and Luke Ross began publication in June 2021 and will conclude in October 2021.
